name: Summer Pong
description:
This game has been developed for the Cosmic Works Studio's "1r Reto Gamedev".

In a GameJam style challenge, the devs have to re-design the classical pong.

There are 3 Game Modes: Local Multiplayer, Singleplayer and Training Mode.

Stage modifications, powerups and IA.

NOTE: If you play in your browser, use FULLSCREEN mode or check your page zoom to adjust the game resolution to your needs.
